name: Robit Mun
description:
R. ROBIT Mun is the last “surviving” repair droid aboard the SS Mun an unfortunate colony ship traveling into a dangerous nebula. ROBIT must franticly repair the ship to keep his crew alive.

“BEEEP BOOP” – R. ROBIT Mun 2235

Tech By Chris Southorn, Jamie Downes and Ford Walton

Design By Josh Hayes and Jamie Downes

Art By Cameron Swain-Laing, Louis Lupton and Tom Rogers

Music/Sound By Conor-Jack Molloy
